Constructor Detail

EvilHangman

public EvilHangman(java.lang.String fileName,
                   boolean debug)
            throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
Construct an EvilHangman object.

Parameters:
fileName - the name of the file that contains the word list.
debug - indicates if the size of the remaining word list should be included in the toString result.
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - when the fileName file does not exist.
Method Detail

playGame

public void playGame()
Plays one the game. The user guesses letters until either they guess the word, or they run out of guesses. Game status is printed each turn and winning / losing information is printed at the conclusion of the game.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Creates and returns a status string that indicates the state of the game.

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
the game status string.
